operations.body: Implemented script-assisted sprint review/carryover workflow via jira/scripts/report_sprint_review.sh. It auto-detects active sprint, computes committed/completed/open metrics, writes sprint review markdown, and generates carryover candidate docs plus move command block when a future sprint exists. Evidence: jira/reports/sprint_review_SCRUM_Sprint_1_2026-02-09.md and jira/reports/carryover_candidates_SCRUM_Sprint_1_2026-02-09.md
